verses.verse: Finally, <WG3063> my <WG3450> brothers, <WG80> rejoice <WG5463> in <WG1722> the Lord. <WG2962> To write <WG1125> the same things <WG846> to you, <WG5213> to me <WG1698> indeed <WG3303> is not <WG3756> tiresome, <WG3636> but <WG1161> for you <WG5213> it is safe. <WG804>
Beware <WG991> of the dogs, <WG2965> beware <WG991> of <WG2040> the evil <WG2556> workers, <WG2040> beware <WG991> of the false circumcision. <WG2699>

For <WG1063> we <WG2249> are <WG2070> the circumcision, <WG4061> who worship <WG3000> God <WG2316> in the Spirit, <WG4151> and <WG2532> rejoice <WG2744> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus, <WG2424> and <WG2532> have <WG3982> no <WG3756> confidence <WG3982> in <WG1722> the flesh; <WG4561>

though <WG2539> I <WG1473> myself might <WG2192> <WG2532> have <WG2192> confidence <WG4006> even in <WG1722> the flesh. <WG4561> If <WG1487> any <WG5100> other <WG243> man <WG5100> thinks <WG1380> that he has confidence <WG3982> in <WG1722> the flesh, <WG4561> I <WG1473> yet more: <WG3123>

circumcised <WG4061> the eighth <WG3637> day, <WG1537> of the stock <WG1085> of Israel, <WG2474> of the tribe <WG5443> of <WG1537> Benjamin, <WG958> a Hebrew <WG1445> of Hebrews; <WG1445> concerning <WG2596> the law, <WG3551> a Pharisee; <WG5330>

concerning <WG2596> zeal, <WG2205> persecuting <WG1377> the assembly; <WG1577> concerning <WG2596> the righteousness <WG1343> which <WG3588> is <WG1096> in <WG1722> the law, <WG3551> found blameless. <WG273>
However, <WG235> what things <WG3748> were <WG2258> gain <WG2771> to me, <WG3427> these <WG5023> have I counted <WG2233> loss <WG2209> for <WG1223> Christ. <WG5547>

Yes <WG235> most certainly, <WG3304> and <WG2532> I count <WG2233> all things <WG3956> to be <WG1511> loss <WG2209> for <WG1223> the excellency <WG5242> of the knowledge <WG1108> of Christ <WG5547> Jesus, <WG2424> my <WG3450> Lord, <WG2962> for <WG1223> whom <WG3739> I suffered the loss of <WG2210> all things, <WG3956> and <WG2532> count <WG2233> them nothing but refuse, <WG4657> that <WG2443> I <WG1511> may gain <WG2770> Christ <WG5547>

and <WG2532> be found <WG2147> in <WG1722> him, <WG846> not <WG3361> having <WG2192> a righteousness <WG1343> of <WG1537> my own, <WG1699> that which is <WG3588> of <WG1537> the law, <WG3551> but <WG235> that which is <WG3588> through <WG1223> faith <WG4102> in Christ, <WG5547> the righteousness <WG1343> which is <WG3588> from God <WG2316> by <WG1909> faith; <WG4102>

that <WG3588> I may know <WG1097> him, <WG846> and <WG2532> the power <WG1411> of <WG386> his <WG846> resurrection, <WG386> and <WG2532> the fellowship <WG2842> of <WG3804> his <WG846> sufferings, <WG3804> becoming conformed to <WG4833> his <WG846> death; <WG2288>
if <WG1487> by any means <WG4459> I may attain <WG2658> to <WG1519> the resurrection <WG1815> from the dead. <WG3498>

Not <WG3756> that <WG3754> I have <WG2983> already <WG2235> obtained, <WG2983> or <WG2228> am <WG5048> already <WG2235> made perfect; <WG5048> but <WG1161> I press on, <WG1377> if <WG1487> it is so that <WG2532> I may take hold <WG2638> of that for <WG1909> which <WG3739> also <WG2532> I was taken hold <WG2638> of <WG5259> by Christ <WG5547> Jesus. <WG2424>

Brothers, <WG80> I <WG1473> don't <WG3756> regard <WG3049> myself <WG1683> as yet having taken hold, <WG2638> but <WG1161> one thing <WG1520> I do. <WG1950> Forgetting the things <WG3303> which are <WG3588> behind, <WG3694> and <WG1161> stretching forward <WG1901> to the things which are <WG3588> before, <WG1715>
I press <WG1377> on toward <WG2596> the goal <WG4649> for <WG1909> the prize <WG1017> of the <WG2821> high <WG507> calling <WG2821> of God <WG2316> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus. <WG2424>

Let us <WG5426> therefore, <WG3767> as many as <WG3745> are perfect, <WG5046> think <WG5426> this <WG5124> way. <WG5426> <WG2532> If <WG1487> in anything <WG5100> you think <WG5426> otherwise, <WG2088> God <WG2316> will also reveal <WG601> <WG2532> that <WG5124> to you. <WG5213>

Nevertheless, <WG4133> to <WG1519> the extent <WG3739> that we have already attained, <WG5348> let us walk <WG4748> by the <WG2583> same <WG846> rule. <WG2583> Let us be of the <WG846> same mind. <WG5426>

Brothers, <WG80> be <WG1096> imitators together <WG4831> of me, <WG3450> and <WG2532> note <WG4648> those who walk <WG4043> this way, <WG3779> even as you have <WG2192> us <WG2248> for <WG2531> an example. <WG5179>

For <WG1063> many <WG4183> walk, <WG4043> of whom <WG3739> I told <WG3004> you <WG5213> often, <WG4178> and <WG1161> now <WG3568> tell you <WG3004> even <WG2532> weeping, <WG2799> as the enemies <WG2190> of the cross <WG4716> of Christ, <WG5547>

whose <WG3739> end <WG5056> is destruction, <WG684> whose <WG3739> god <WG2316> is the belly, <WG2836> and <WG2532> whose <WG3739> glory <WG1391> is in <WG1722> their <WG846> shame, <WG152> who <WG3588> think about earthly things. <WG1919>

For <WG1063> our <WG2257> citizenship <WG4175> is <WG5225> in <WG1722> heaven, <WG3772> from <WG1537> where <WG3739> we also <WG2532> wait <WG553> for a Savior, <WG4990> the Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ; <WG5547>

who <WG3739> will change <WG3345> the body <WG4983> of our <WG2257> humiliation <WG5014> <WG846> to <WG1519> be <WG1096> conformed to <WG2596> the body <WG4983> of his <WG846> glory, <WG1391> according to <WG2596> the working <WG1753> by which <WG3588> he <WG846> is able <WG1410> even <WG2532> to subject <WG5293> all things <WG3956> to himself. <WG1438>
